class.name: TextServerManager
class.description: [TextServerManager] is the API backend for loading, enumerating, and switching [TextServer]s. [b]Note:[/b] Switching text server at runtime is possible, but will invalidate all fonts and text buffers. Make sure to unload all controls, fonts, and themes before doing so.

method.name: find_interface
method.description: Finds an interface by its [param name].

method.name: get_interface
method.description: Returns the interface registered at a given index.

method.name: get_interface_count
method.description: Returns the number of interfaces currently registered.

method.name: get_interfaces
method.description: Returns a list of available interfaces, with the index and name of each interface.

method.name: get_primary_interface
method.description: Returns the primary [TextServer] interface currently in use.

method.name: remove_interface
method.description: Removes an interface. All fonts and shaped text caches should be freed before removing an interface.

signal.name: interface_added
signal.description: Emitted when a new interface has been added.

signal.name: interface_removed
signal.description: Emitted when an interface is removed.
